channel.title: Washington UPC Announcement Blog
channel.description: Current events and announcements for the Washington District of the United Pentecostal Church International. Keep up-to-date on all happenings within the district.

item.title: Calling all Men!!
item.description:
This past weekend marked the 13th Annual Men's Conference in the Washington District, Apostolic Man. It is wonderful to see so many men gathered together to worship and honor Jesus Christ and to spend time in preparation, learning how to be better servants and workers.

The guest minister was Rev. Tim McCary, Pastor of Phoenix Revival Center and General Secretary for the Apostolic Man Division of the UPCI. Rev. McCary brought some on fire message during our Holy Ghost Revival and shared in teaching his knowledge of Hebrew. We also received teaching from other district ministers including Revs. Darcy Ross, Roger Roth, Clifford Barnett, Jeffrey Hall, Mark Dillon and a superb message on the importance of being a good Dad from our host pastor Rev. Grant Knowles.







The men of the District were encouraged by our General Secretary, Rev. Gary Blaylock, to bring the Men's Ministries in Washington District into a more active role in the state. This will start with the June collection of 'A Father's Gift' the annual offering for the Men's Ministries and continue on through the T.E.A.M. ministry. The T.E.A.M. ministry is designed to help out throughout the district, using the talents on the Washington men wherever they are needed.

As always, included with the teaching was great fellowship at the hotel, at area restaurants and our now famous Gym Night on Friday evening after service.

Stay tuned for more information about Apostolic Man and T.E.A.M. ministries at Washington District Online.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 2008 District Calendars Available!
item.description: The District Calendars for 2008 are now available for order. The Calendars contain the dates for all district sponsored events as well as those already scheduled within the differenct sections. All orders are filled on a first come first serve basis and last years went early so be sure to order yours today. Click here to order your 2008 District Calendar.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: June/July Issue of the Washington Word
item.description: The June/July Issue of the Washington Word is now available, even more content is online. Go to http://www.waword.com.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: Summer conference in Lynnwood next week.
item.description: Join us at the Summer District conference in Lynnwood July 18-20 at the Lynnwood Conference Center. Click here for more details.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: New Youth Ministries Website!
item.description: Take a look at the new Washington Youth Ministries website at http://www.upcyouth.org. The new website will keep you up to date on the events and activities that the youth organization is sponsoring. Visit the site and be sure to bookmark so you can come back often to keep up-to-date.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: Spring Conference 2007 - Yakima, WA
item.description: This year's Spring Conference will be held at the Clarion Inn and Conference Center in Yakima, WA. Our speaker and WEC representative will be Rev. Terry Pugh. For more information including Maps, Hotel information and downloadables, go to WaUPC Online.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: Apostolic Man XII - 12th Annual Men's Conference
item.description:
The 12th Annual Men's Conference, Apostolic Man XII, is being held in Bellevue, Washington at the Sanctuary of Praise United Pentecostal Church, hosted by Pastor Harold Kern and the Washington District UPC's Men's Department.

The Conference begins on February 15 with 6 pm Prayer services followed by a message given by this year's guest speaker, Rev. Bill Davis of Macon Georgia.

More information and online registration can be found on the Internet at a WaUPC Online.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: Abundant Life Tabernacle now Online!
item.description: The Abundant Life Tabernacle of Walla Walla, pastored by Pastor Jeff Hall has just announced their new website at http://www.ALTWallaWalla.com. Check out the new site and give them some encouraging feedback.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty-Eight
item.description:
Welcome to Day 28 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will be ...

Empowered with assurance.
"Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time"
(I Peter 1:5)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty-Seven
item.description:
Welcome to Day 27 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will be ...

Empowered with joy.
"The joy of the LORD is your strength"
(Nehemiah 8:10)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty-Six
item.description:
Welcome to Day 26 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will be ...

Empowered with strength.
"Strengthened with all might, according to His glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness"
(Colossians 1:11)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty-Five
item.description:
Welcome to Day 25 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will be ...

Empowered to do good works.
"How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him"
(Acts 10:38)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty-Four
item.description:
Welcome to Day 24 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will be ...

Empowered for the miraculous.
"And Stephen, full of faith and power, did great wonders and miracles among the people"
(Acts 6:8)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty-Three
item.description:
Welcome to Day 23 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will be ...

Empowered to witness.
"And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the LORD Jesus: and great grace was upon them all"
(Acts 4:33)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty-Two
item.description:
Welcome to Day 22 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will be ...

Empowered by the Holy Ghost.
"But you shall receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you; and you shall be witnesses to Me in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the end of the earth"
(Acts 1:8, NKJV)

Pray that we will ...

Search our hearts.
"Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts"
(Psalm 139:23)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty-One
item.description:
Welcome to Day 21 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Demonstrate righteousness.
"My mouth shall tell of Your righteousness and Your salvation all the day, for I do not know their limits"
(Psalm 71:15, NKJV)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twenty
item.description:
Welcome to Day 20 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Put on Christ.
"But put ye on the LORD Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfill the lusts thereof"
(Romans 13:14)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Nineteen
item.description:
Welcome to Day 19 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Make right decisions.
"Therefore to him that knoweth to do good,
and doeth it not, to him it is sin"
(James 4:17)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Eighteen
item.description:
Welcome to Day 18 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Possess right motives.
"The LORD shall judge the peoples; Judge me, O LORD, according to my righteousness, and according to my integrity within me"
(Psalm 7:8, NKJV)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Seventeen
item.description:
Welcome to Day 17 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Renew a right spirit in us.
"…and renew a right spirit within me"
(Psalm 51:10)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Sixteen
item.description:
Welcome to Day 16 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Cleanse our hearts.
"Create in me a clean heart O God ..."
(Psalm 51:10)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Fifteen
item.description:
Welcome to Day 15 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Search Our Hearts.
"Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts"
(Psalm 139:23)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Fourteen
item.description:
Welcome to Day 14 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Intercede for revival.
"And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind, and it filled all the house where they were sitting. And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire,
and it sat upon each of them. And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and began to speak with other tongues, as the Spirit gave them utterance"
(Acts 2:2-4).
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Thirteen
item.description:
Welcome to Day 13 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Intercede for our pastors.
"Continue earnestly in prayer, being vigilant in it with thanksgiving; meanwhile praying also for us, that God would open to us a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in chains, that I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak"
(Colossians 4:2-4, NKJV)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)

item.title: 30 Days of F.I.R.E. - Day Twelve
item.description:
Welcome to Day 12 of 30 Days of F.I.R.E.

Today's Focus: Pray that we will ...

Intercede for the churches.
Paul interceded for the Ephesians: "For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our LORD Jesus Christ, of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named, that he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man"
(Ephesians 3:14-16).
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Washington Minister)
